name: Telekinetic Strikes
description: Utilizing psionic force to deliver non-physical blows to opponents.

cards.title: Generating a Telekinetic Strike
cards.description: Techniques to direct psionic force in a concentrated impact.
cards.bulletpoints: Force Channeling, Shockwave Techniques, Target Focus
cards.summaryText: Compress intent into a single vector and release it as a psionic punch that hits without touch.

cards.title: Advanced Telekinetic Combat
cards.description: Refining strikes for increased force and strategic application.
cards.bulletpoints: Multi-Strike Projection, Energy Wave Expansion, Target Disruption
cards.summaryText: Chain successive force waves and vary angles to overwhelm defenses at range.
